plot: A police inspector finds himself accused of being an accessory to robbery when he tries to cover up for the sake of a friend.
plot_en: A police inspector finds himself accused of being an accessory to robbery when he tries to cover up for the sake of a friend.
plot_es: A police inspector finds himself accused of being an accessory to robbery when he tries to cover up for the sake of a friend.
title: The Big Spender
